metadata.title: CVE-2019-2053 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: In wnm_parse_neighbor_report_elem of wnm_sta.c, there is a possibleout-of-bounds read due to missing bounds check. This could lead to localinformation disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. Userinteraction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android Versions:Android-7.0 Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9Android ID: A-122074159

criterions.comment: wpa package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
wpa package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
